subtitleNullable: News articles from Japanese newspapers, in Japanese and English
descriptionNullable:
News articles from Japanese newspapers, collected from newspapers websites and the [Old Newspapers](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/alvations/old-newspapers) dataset. In Japanese and English.

# Japanese articles subcorpus
* Number of entries: 312954 texts
* Number of sources: 21 newspaper sites
* Dates: July 2005 – Oct 2021

# English articles subcorpus
* Number of entries: 36766 texts
* Number of sources: 2 newspaper sites
* Dates: Jan 2001 – Dec 2021
